oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Performance - Buzz Cason and the Originals - 2005-10-01
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performance by Buzz Cason and the Originals from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on October 1, 2005. In support of the exhibit "Night Train to Nashville: Music City Rhythm and Blues".
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Buzz Cason;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Program begins in progress. Opening comments by Michael Gray. Performances include; Medley consisting of Let's Go, Let's Go, Let's Go / It's Love Baby (24 Hours A Day) -- Maybe Baby -- Soldier Of Love -- Living The Rock-N-Roll Dream -- excerpt of the song Tennessee -- Excerpt of the song Popsicle -- Sandy -- Glory Bound -- Introduction of the band -- Unidentified song possibly titled Why Was I The Last One To Know ? -- Tin Cup Chalice -- Timeless And True Love -- Love's The Only House -- Everlasting Love -- Closing comments.
